channel.title: What to do about the random griefers?
channel.description:
I don't know about others of you, but I've had numerous griefers just come into my cities and take a large amount of time causing as much damage as possible (obviously while I'm asleep). I don't know whether it's the same person, but either way an IP ban isn't going to be very helpful.
It wouldn't be a problem if BigBrother actually worked properly. I've had objects and items just disappear without even being recorded on bb, and when a rollback is done on a griefer their damage is rarely fully reversed (eg, half iron doors and unset signs).
Whitelist anyone?
